title: fps drop when laptop unplugged help!!!!

replies.body: Ahhhh this can actually be pretty common, as most laptops will automatically be set to power saving mode when the cord is unplugged which means your system isn't running at its fullest capacity anymore.
but the computer is brand new only a month old
What operating system are you using? I might help bring you some more power.
I never said anything about that laptop going bad, it's just a fact for the technology. If it's not plugged in it's not going to be running at its fullest power.
